page.title: 17Pembroke Power Station Pt 3.
page.content: The stack is actually 4 chimneys in 1. Dust is removed before the waste is emitted,by means of a grit arrester which spins and drags the dust to one side.The waste leaves the top of the stack at a speed of 50 m.p.h.which further helps in it's dissipation.On the site there is a secondary,self contained gas turbine power station, producing a maximum 100 megawatts,but due to very high running costs (10 times that of oil) it is used only in dire emergencies.It can however be utilised at the flick of a switch and was used a lot during the recent year long coal strike.The station employs a total of 500 people having an annual wage bill of Â£5,000,000.This,with the Â£5,000,000 annual running costs and Â£3,000,000 annual rate bill from the local authority,makes it a very important asset to the locality.
